Beef Mince 300 grams 

Corn Flour ½ cup 

Bread Crumbs 1 cup 

Crushed Black Pepper ½ tsp 

White Pepper Powder ½ tsp 

Garlic Powder ½ tsp 

Eggs 2-3 

Chinese Salt ½ tsp 

Oil for frying 

Salt to taste 

For Decoration 

Lettuce Leaves as required 

Tomatoes 2

1. Take 300 grams of a beef mince add to taste salt, ½ tsp of garlic powder, ½ tsp of crushed black pepper powder, ½ tsp of white pepper powder, ½ tsp of Chinese salt chop it into the chopper. 

2. Now take a mixing bowl add 3 eggs and beat it. 

3. Now take the beef mixture add it into any mold or shape it with hands like nuggets then coat into ½ cup of corn flour then coat into beat eggs then coat with 1 cup of bread crumbs. 

4. Now repeat this process and ready all the nuggets. 

5. Take a deep wok add oil, heat the oil and fry the nuggets slowly slowly till its golden brown. 

6. Make sure the flame is not high. 

7. At last take it out in a serving platter and garnish with as required lettuce leaves 2 tomatoes and serve it.
